SEARCH

Package org.opencastproject.workspace.api

package org.opencastproject.workspace.api
Package containing Workspace APIs. The workspace serves two functions. First, it provides efficient access to java.io.File objects from potentially remote URIs. Second the workspace provides easy access to the working file repository.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    Workspace
    Provides efficient access java.io.File objects from potentially remote URIs.
